column1: English Sent: The colour of soil varies from one place to the other because soil is formed out of different types of rocks.
Hindi Tansl: eka_sWAna_se xUsare sWAna para mqxA ke raMgoM meM BinnawA pAyI jAwI hE kyoMki mqxA viBinna prakAra kI SEloM se banI howI hEM.
Anu Translation:  mittI kA rafga xUsarA eka sWAna se Binna howA hE kyoMki mittI cattAnoM ke bAhara alaga alaga prakAroM kI banAI huI hE
